item.title: CVE-2024-2259|2024-08-13T10:18:24.658Z -- meddiff%20technologies -- instarispacs
item.description: This vulnerability exists in InstaRISPACS software due to insufficient validation of user supplied input for the loginTo parameter in user login module of the web interface of the application. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted input to the vulnerable parameter to perform reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) attacks on the targeted system.
